prompt: Photorealistic wide shot of an archaeological dig site focused on old bottle discovery, landscape format (16:9). Left third shows hands carefully brushing dirt from a partially unearthed antique aqua glass bottle. Middle and right show other bottle necks and bases emerging from the dark soil, alongside a small trowel and brush. Background is softly blurred woods with dappled sunlight filtering through leaves. Documentary style, natural lighting, emphasizing the moment of discovery. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6.0
name: old-bottle-identification-image-1.png

prompt: Extreme close-up macro photograph of antique bottle identification features, landscape format (16:9). Left side features a hand holding the base of an old clear glass bottle, sharply focused on a distinct pontil scar or mold seam catching the light. Right side shows a vintage-style magnifying glass hovering over this detail, slightly blurred. Background is a simple, dark, textured wooden workbench surface. Lighting is bright, focused studio light from the side, dramatically highlighting glass texture, imperfections, and the specific identification mark. Photorealistic, clinical detail. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6.0
name: old-bottle-identification-image-2.png

prompt: Professional still life photograph showcasing a diverse collection of antique glass bottles arranged on rustic wooden shelves, landscape format (16:9). Bottles of various shapes (medicine, soda, liquor, ink) and colors (aqua, amber, cobalt blue, olive green, clear) are neatly arranged across the width of the frame, some standing, some tilted. Focus is sharp across the collection, highlighting variety. Soft, diffused natural light streams from an unseen window to the left, creating gentle highlights and warm tones. Photorealistic, organized yet natural composition. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6.0
name: old-bottle-identification-image-3.png

prompt: Overhead flat lay composition depicting old bottle research and documentation, landscape format (16:9). An open antique bottle identification guide with detailed illustrations occupies the left third. Center and right feature several different old glass bottles placed near the book, alongside brass calipers measuring a bottle neck, a worn leather-bound notebook, and a graphite pencil. A corner of a faded historical map peeks out from under the book. Warm, soft indoor lighting simulating a desk lamp illuminates the scene. Photorealistic, scholarly atmosphere. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6.0
name: old-bottle-identification-image-4.png

prompt: Dramatic macro photograph focusing intently on an embossed maker's mark on an old bottle, landscape format (16:9). The frame is tightly cropped around the embossed lettering 'OWENS' inside a square on the base of a weathered, slightly iridescent amber glass bottle. The lettering is razor-sharp, while the surrounding glass texture (tiny bubbles, wear marks) curves away into soft focus, filling the widescreen frame. Lighting is strong, low-angle side lighting, making the embossed details stand out starkly against the glass surface. High-detail photorealism, emphasizing texture and specific identifying marks. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6.0
name: old-bottle-identification-image-5.png
